c74object.name: hoa.onepole~
c74object.digest: A multichannel version of the onepole~ object.
c74object.description: hoa.onepole~ is a multichannel version of the onepole~ object. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

c74object.discussion: hoa.onepole~ is a multichannel version of the onepole~ object. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.
